definition: but/yet/however/while/to go back/to decline/to retreat/nevertheless/even though
a step/a pace/walk/march/stages in a process/situation

sentences.english: The insecurity of the venture kept investors away.
sentences.chinese: 這種冒險事業的不安全性使投資者望而卻步。

sentences.english: Charge deaths' God also will flinch. The happy flowers bloom everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 死神也忘而卻步，幸福之花處處開遍。

sentences.english: But the high price of it makes a lot of demanders hang back.
sentences.chinese: 然而路由器的高昂價格卻令許多需求者望而卻步。

sentences.english: Hour-long queues at the tills that snaked around the store were putting many shoppers off.
sentences.chinese: 商店裏蜿蜒曲折，近一小時的長隊讓很多購物者卻步。

sentences.english: The unsuitable location of some projects keeps applicants at bay.
sentences.chinese: 一些安居工程也因爲位置不當使得申請者望而卻步。

sentences.english: Her flat black suede boots and cardigan help make this cooler weather appropriate.
sentences.chinese: 黑色平底的山羊皮長靴和羊毛衫讓秋涼望而卻步。

sentences.english: Dark energy is a more daunting problem still.
sentences.chinese: 暗能量依舊是一個更加令人卻步的問題。

sentences.english: The plainness of these houses discourages many prospective buyers.
sentences.chinese: 這些房子很難看，使許多潛在的買主望而卻步。

sentences.english: Thanks to the site's popularity, that has not held developers back.
sentences.chinese: 由於該網站的流行，此舉並未能使開發者望而卻步。

sentences.english: But, at the same time, high-price of the shops makes ordinary consumers dare not to enter.
sentences.chinese: 但同時，店內高價會另一般的顧客卻步。

sentences.english: The cost of the Apple Watch—which starts at $300—puts people off.
sentences.chinese: 蘋果手錶以300美元開售的價格讓很多人望而卻步。

sentences.english: Perhaps dieters are seeking out their shunned treats in regular nightly escapes.
sentences.chinese: 或許節食者們都在夢中追求平時望而卻步的滿漢全席。

sentences.english: Still, should the scab of the sheep cause the shepherd to recoil?
sentences.chinese: 可是羔羊的癬疥應當使牧人卻步嗎？

sentences.english: The lack of hard science is enough to scare off my friend.
sentences.chinese: 缺乏自然科學常識足以使我的朋友望而卻步了。

sentences.english: Shark Tale is a cartoon, but don't let that scare you.
sentences.chinese: 《鯊魚黑幫》是部卡通影片，但你不要望而卻步。

sentences.english: I have heard that some social groups to help AIDS orphans is on the back.
sentences.chinese: 有些社會團體一聽到幫助的是艾滋病人遺孤就卻步了。

definition: stuck and not moving forward (idiom); stagnant/in a rut/at a standstill
to wait and see/to watch from the sidelines/to look around/to survey
to cut prices/to discount/to mark down/price cutting
to turn a blind eye to
change of appearance/to revise one's point of view
odds of success/stratagem that ensures success/to be sure of success
to rush like ducks (idiom); the mob scrabbles madly for sth unobtainable/an unruly crowd on a wild goose chase
